title: How can you discover your true self and reach higher levels of energy?
first_phrase: In this final section, Perceval's journey through the initiation process continues as he meets a beautiful woman and a knight who connect to the previous lessons on staying aware of oneself and feeling energy. The concept of meeting one's double or other self is explored, and Perceval gains new powers after defeating a giant and witnessing a flying man. The section concludes with an exercise to look in the mirror and see oneself as the beautiful unknown. The text also touches on the theme of the hero's journey, where one must confront and overcome inner challenges to reach a higher state of being.
content: He says he is the Beautiful unknown and he becomes friend with Perceval It is a curious name “the beautiful unknown” This beautiful unknown is another level of yourself Only after having had gone through the first initiation you can really meet our real double,our other self, and meeting him be can begin to develop our energy Both arrive now to a beautiful house where there is a lake with fishes This lake is a symbol of energy. From now on you will be a chevalier of energy Exercise Go in front of a mirror. Again look at you. Always without blinking Who is in front of you? Who is the beautiful unknown? Obviously, after the previous meditations, the experience will be different than at the second stage In the next lesson we will delve into five experiences. You can access them because you are now connected to the second level of initiation. You have been admitted to it. ________________ Thanks for your attention and determination until now ! We hope you are understanding this new realm of reality and that you have begun also you to transform yourself ________________ The Hero's Journey We have only to follow the thread of the hero path. And where we had thought to find an abomination, we shall find a God. And where we had thought to slay another, we shall slay ourselves. And where we had thought to travel outward, we shall come to the center of our own existence. And where we had thought to be alone, we shall be with all the world."
last_phrase: We hope that you have enjoyed this journey of self-discovery and have gained valuable insights into your true self. By accessing the second level of initiation, you have opened the doors to five experiences that will further enhance your energy and transformation. Remember that the beautiful unknown is another level of yourself, waiting to be discovered. Joseph Campbell's words remind us that the hero's journey leads to finding the divine within ourselves, and we invite you to continue on this path towards self-realization. Join us in the upcoming lessons as we explore the Temple of Solomon and the Graal.
